subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods is ready to play after the death of his father, Earl Woods. If Woods plays well enough, he will play golf Sunday on Father's Day, the day has been special to him for many reasons.
snippet: Tiger Woods is ready to play after the death of his father, Earl Woods. If Woods plays well enough, he will play golf Sunday on Father's Day, the day has been special to him for many reasons.
